description.value:
You make a ranged Strikewith a thrown weapon you already have in your hand, Stride, and then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Interact] to draw another weapon.

If you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Rage]{Raging}, you can add the additional damage with melee weapons you receive from raging to your damage with the thrown weapon.
